newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks shed 1.9 pct on poor turnover.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks shed 1.9 pct on poor turnover.

text.p: Dhaka stocks fell for a fifth straight session on Thursday as investor confidence continued to dwindle despite assurances from the finance minister that the market would not crash, brokers said.

The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all share price index shed 51.9 points or 1.9 percent at 2,667.1. Of 66 traded issues, 62 lost, 3 gained and 1 was unchanged. Turnover slumped to 10.4 million taka, the lowest since July. "The finance minister gave an encouraging signal. Some companies also made positive disclosure recently. But nothing could reassure the investors," said a broker. Beximco Pharma shed 17 taka to 337 and ACI Ltd shed 12 to 237. --Dhaka Newsroom +880-2-506363.
